experiences.name: Fiksu
bullets: Built and maintained a robust data pipeline with high uptime, low latency, and high throughput.
Designed and delivered systems involving multiple engineering teams.
Created internal APIs to abstract away complex synchronization of multiple data sources.

experiences.name: GE Healthcare
bullets: Optimized a parallel-processing Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) implementation in OpenCL, improving upon existing optimizations by speed increases of more than 18%.
Designed and executed performance benchmarking methodology for AMD parallel computing platforms.
Used buggy alpha versions of software and firmware, and identified and implemented bugfixes.
